patterns: What is Erode Sengunthar Engineering College?
responses: Erode Sengunthar Engineering College, established in 1996, is permanently affiliated to Anna University, approved by AICTE, and accredited by NAAC with an 'A' grade and by the NBA.
Our college, founded in 1996, is committed to providing world-class technical education. We offer various UG and PG degree courses.

patterns: What are the B.E. B.Tech programs available?
Which engineering branches do you have?
Tell me about the master's degrees.
responses: We offer a range of UG and PG courses. Our B.E./B.Tech courses include CSE, IT, AI & Data Science, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, and Chemical Engineering. Our PG courses include M.E. in Computer Science, VLSI, and Power Electronics, as well as MBA and MCA programs.

You can apply online through the admissions portal on our official website. The process involves filling out the application form, uploading necessary documents, and paying the application fee. Admissions are based on TNEA counseling and also through the management quota.

patterns: How much does it cost to study here?
How much are the fees for first year engineering?
responses: Based on the Fee Committee's order for Government Quota students, the first-year tuition fee for Accredited B.E./B.Tech courses is ₹55,000 per year, and for Non-Accredited courses, it is ₹50,000 per year. An additional development fee of ₹5,000 can be collected.

patterns: What are the management quota fees?
How much are the fees for direct admission?
responses: For Management Quota students, the first-year tuition fee for Accredited B.E./B.Tech courses is ₹87,000 per year, and for Non-Accredited courses, it is ₹85,000 per year. An additional development fee of ₹5,000 can be collected.

patterns: Do the fees include hostel charges?
What is not included in the tuition fee?
responses: The fixed tuition fee does not include charges for Hostel, Transport, or Mess. Those are separate.
Yes, we offer various government and private scholarships for meritorious students. You can find more details in the 'Scholarships' section of our admissions page on the official college website.

patterns: Tell me about your technical partnerships.
responses: We provide a wide range of facilities including a central Library, separate Hostels, and Transport services. We also have strong industry collaborations through our Cisco Local Academy, Infosys Campus Connect partnership, e-Yantra center, and an IIT Bombay Remote Center for enhanced learning.

Our college has a strong placement record with over 655 students placed in 62+ companies in 2023-24. Prominent recruiters include TCS, Wipro, HCL, Cognizant, and Infosys. You can find more details on the 'Placement' section of our website.
